mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: SPECIAL FEATURES "Square Dance Vacations - 1961", "Flashes From Detroit", "Overseas Dateline", "Another Look at Tapping", and "Let's Smooth It Out". This edition also includes the the regular features entitled "The Square Dance Picture", "Square Dance Date Book", "From the Floor", "As I See It", "Dancer's Walkthru", "Americana: Cornwallis Country Dance", "Style Series: Getting into Lines of Fours and Threes", "Round the Outside Ring", "Workshop", "Paging the Roundancers: Ivan and Phyllis Hall", "Caller of the Month: Dick Steele", "Experimental Lab: Progressive Squares", and "On the Record".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
